thread.title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Robbie Roscoe gets a scare in the shower tonight - Hollyoaks Soaps
thread.title_full: Hollyoaks spoilers: Robbie Roscoe gets a scare in the shower tonight - Hollyoaks News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Daniel Kilkelly
title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Robbie Roscoe gets a scare in the shower tonight - Hollyoaks Soaps
text: Hollyoaks bad boy Robbie Roscoe gets surprised in the shower tonight (October 12) by the last person he was hoping to see.Trevor Royle (Greg Wood) decides to give the teen a scare after growing suspicious over his strange behaviour.The drama plays out after Robbie (Charlie Wernham) continues to spy on Trevor, desperate to find anything that would be useful to the police.When Robbie follows Trevor to an unfamiliar address, he's shocked when the gangster's ex-partner Grace Black appears at the window and starts angrily throwing things at him.Trevor isn't too pleased to see Robbie giggling away from afar and wonders why he's being spied on, so later sneaks up on him in the shower. Caught off guard, how will Robbie explain himself? © Lime PicturesTrevor surprises Robbie in the shower © Lime PicturesTrevor wants answers from Robbie © Lime PicturesTrevor wants to know why he's being spied on © Lime PicturesRobbie tries to explain himself © Lime PicturesWill Robbie's story be believed? Hollyoaks' latest episode also sees Ste Hay's fling with Harry Thompson continue as they seize the chance for more alone time.When Ste (Kieron Richardson) brings Harry's dad Tony some bad news about his Hollyoaks Pride plans, the businessman rushes out to deal with the problem.Harry (Parry Glasspool) has homework to do but Ste can't resist enticing him away. Is it only a matter of time before their steamy affair is exposed? © Lime PicturesSte tries to entice Harry away from his homework © Lime PicturesSte undresses Harry © Lime PicturesSte and Harry kiss © Lime PicturesSte leads Harry upstairs to the bedroom Hollyoaks airs these scenes tonight (September 12) at 7pm on E4 and tomorrow (September 13) at 6.30pm on Channel 4.Read our full spoiler for this episode of HollyoaksRead more Hollyoaks spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on Ben and Kathy's EastEnders reunion, Aaron's Emmerdale arrest, important news for Fiz and Tyrone in Coronation Street and a shock kidnapping in Hollyoaks. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
